skill.name: data-analysis
skill.description: AI-powered data analysis for Empathy Ledger. Use when working with themes, quotes, story suggestions, transcript analysis, storyteller connections, or any feature requiring extracted insights. Ensures consistent analysis patterns across the platform.
skill.summary: AI-powered data analysis for Empathy Ledger. Use when working with themes, quotes, story suggestions...
skill.author: Acurioustractor

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing markdown files with code patterns and examples. No executable scripts, network calls, or file access capabilities. Safe for publication.

content.value_statement: Extract meaningful themes and quotes from storytelling content using consistent AI-powered patterns. Build smarter content recommendations and discover connections between stories across your platform.
actual_capabilities: Extract themes from transcript and story content using AI
Generate key quotes with significance scoring
Query database for theme overlap and similarity
Create analytics dashboards for content trends
limitations: Does not execute AI analysis itself
Requires existing database schema and API endpoints

prompt_templates.prompt: List the top 10 themes by story count with percentages

output_examples.input: Find stories related to themes of healing and hope
output: Found 12 stories about healing and hope
Top match: 'Our Journey to Healing' shares 75% theme overlap
Featured quote: 'Hope is the fire that keeps us warm in winter.'

best_practices: Use server-side theme filtering with Supabase array operations for better performance
Normalize theme names before storage to ensure consistent matching
Limit extracted themes to 5-7 per story to maintain quality
Display featured quotes prominently on story cards for engagement
anti_patterns: Fetching all columns then filtering client-side instead of using server-side Supabase filters
Storing duplicate or inconsistent theme variations without normalization
Displaying too many themes on small UI components like cards and badges
Using hard-coded theme lists instead of dynamic queries from the database

faq.question: Which databases are supported?
faq.answer: Supabase PostgreSQL database with array columns for themes

faq.question: How many themes can I extract?
faq.answer: Recommended 5-7 themes per story for optimal quality and display

faq.question: Can I use this with other AI services?
faq.answer: Yes, patterns work with OpenAI and Anthropic API integrations

faq.question: Is my data secure?
faq.answer: Skill only provides patterns; actual data stays in your Supabase database

faq.question: Why are my queries slow?
faq.answer: Use GIN indexes on theme arrays and server-side filtering instead of client-side

faq.question: How is this different from generic data analysis?
faq.answer: Optimized for storytelling content with theme taxonomy and quote extraction built in
